text: avaru elle irali, avara mele apamanavannu heralagide â€“ allahana jotegina kararu athava janara jotegina kararina adharadalli avaru padeyuva tatkalika raksaneyu matra idakke horatagide. Avaru allahana krodhavannu sampadisikondiddare mattu avara mele daridravannu heri bidalagide. Ekendare avaru allahana vacanagalannu dhikkarisuttiddaru hagu an'yayavagi pravadigala hatye nadesuttiddaru mattu avaru avidheyaragiddaru hagu miti miruvavaragiddaru
